name: Puppet-extagent
tagline: Puppet module for deployment of the SNMP Extension Agent
body:
# Description

Puppet module for deployment of the [SNMP Extension Agent](http://jtyr.github.io/extagent) (Extagent). Extagent  is a set of monitoring sensors which extend the functionality of the standard SNMP
daemon.

# Installation

```
$ git clone https://github.com/jtyr/puppet-extagent.git
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
